Package searchengine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Index
    The index data structure provides a way to build an index from a list of websites.
    Score
    The Score interface shall be used by the TFScore and TDIDFScore classes to calculate a score to use, when ranking the websites in the QueryHandler
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLIApplication
    Turns our search engine into a command-line application.
    FileHelper
    FileHelper contains all methods that help reading a database of websites from a file.
    IndexBenchmark
    The Indexing benchmark.
    IndexBenchmark.BenchmarkState
    The state used by all each run of the benchmark.
    InvertedIndex
    InvertedIndex is a super class, which is extended by InvertedIndexHashMap and InvertedIndexTreeMap.
    InvertedIndexHashMap
    The InvertedIndexHashMap is extending the InvertedIndex and is responsible of creating a HashMap to use as index in our SearchEngine.
    InvertedIndexTreeMap
    The InvertedIndexTreeMap is extending the InvertedIndex.and is responsible of creating a TreeMap to use as index in our SearchEngine.
    QueryHandler
    This class is responsible for answering queries to our search engine.
    SearchEngine
    The search engine.
    SimpleIndex
    SimpleIndex implements Index to build an index from a list of websites.
    TFIDFScore
    The TFIDFScore class implements the Score Interface.
    TFIDFScoreTest
    Test how the TFIDFScore is able score and rank various searches.
    TFScore
    TFScore contains one method to calculate the Term Frequency.
    TFScoreTest
    Test how the TFScore is able score and rank various searches.
    WebApplication
    Turns our search engine into a Web application, using Spring Boot.
    Website
    A website is the basic entity of the search engine.
